title: Rep Rise
description: Backend foundation project built with Spring Boot, focused on implementing JWT authentication integrated with PostgreSQL. Designed for scalability, security, and clean RESTful architecture using a controller–service–repository pattern. Ideal for kickstarting secure fullstack applications. Check it out at https://github.com/sameer-a05/repRise

title: Everest NFT Marketplace
description: Transformed a static single-page application into an interactive UI with animations, transitions, and carousels, utilising Axios for dynamic data representation. Employed Git for version control and collaboration. Check it out at https://blockchainnft.vercel.app/

title: AI fire predictor
description: Early-stage AI project aimed at developing a system to predict forest fires using environmental sensor data and satellite imagery. Currently in the planning phase, with a focus on building accurate, real-time models to help prevent wildfire spread and improve emergency response
